entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow ending in the morning then cloudy and 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
